name: Zombies or something
description:
Week 1/5 - 1 Week 1 Prototype

A game where you protect a guy from zombies.

Controls:

Left click a zombie to kill it

As this game is just a short prototype, We might not continue development of this project. As we think of this as just a test of what we learn. If there is a need, any sort of need, we will continue development of this game.

Made in 4-5 hours.
